title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 27 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 27 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Moreover Job continued his parable, and said,
lineList.cn: 约伯接着说，

lineList.en: As God liveth, who hath taken away my judgment; and the Almighty, who hath vexed my soul;
lineList.cn: 神夺去我的理，全能者使我心中愁苦。我指着永生的神起誓。

lineList.en: All the while my breath is in me, and the spirit of God is in my nostrils;
lineList.cn: 我的生命尚在我里面，神所赐呼吸之气，仍在我的鼻孔内。

lineList.en: My lips shall not speak wickedness, nor my tongue utter deceit.
lineList.cn: 我的嘴决不说非义之言，我的舌也不说诡诈之语。

lineList.en: God forbid that I should justify you: till I die I will not remove mine integrity from me.
lineList.cn: 我断不以你们为是，我至死必不以自己为不正。

lineList.en: My righteousness I hold fast, and will not let it go: my heart shall not reproach me so long as I live.
lineList.cn: 我持定我的义，必不放松。在世的日子，我心必不责备我。

lineList.en: Let mine enemy be as the wicked, and he that riseth up against me as the unrighteous.
lineList.cn: 愿我的仇敌如恶人一样。愿那起来攻击我的，如不义之人一般。

lineList.en: For what is the hope of the hypocrite, though he hath gained, when God taketh away his soul?
lineList.cn: 不敬虔的人虽然得利，神夺取其命的时候，还有什么指望呢。

lineList.en: Will God hear his cry when trouble cometh upon him?
lineList.cn: 患难临到他，神岂能听他的呼求。

lineList.en: Will he delight himself in the Almighty? will he always call upon God?
lineList.cn: 他岂以全能者为乐，随时求告神呢。

lineList.en: I will teach you by the hand of God: that which is with the Almighty will I not conceal.
lineList.cn: 神的作为，我要指教你们。全能者所行的，我也不隐瞒。

lineList.en: Behold, all ye yourselves have seen it; why then are ye thus altogether vain?
lineList.cn: 你们自己也都见过，为何全然变为虚妄呢。

lineList.en: This is the portion of a wicked man with God, and the heritage of oppressors, which they shall receive of the Almighty.
lineList.cn: 神为恶人所定的分，强暴人从全能者所得的报（报原文作产业）乃是这样。

lineList.en: If his children be multiplied, it is for the sword: and his offspring shall not be satisfied with bread.
lineList.cn: 倘或他的儿女增多，还是被刀所杀。他的子孙必不得饱食。

lineList.en: Those that remain of him shall be buried in death: and his widows shall not weep.
lineList.cn: 他所遗留的人必死而埋葬，他的寡妇也不哀哭。

lineList.en: Though he heap up silver as the dust, and prepare raiment as the clay;
lineList.cn: 他虽积蓄银子如尘沙，预备衣服如泥土。

lineList.en: He may prepare it, but the just shall put it on, and the innocent shall divide the silver.
lineList.cn: 他只管预备，义人却要穿上。他的银子，无辜的人要分取。

lineList.en: He buildeth his house as a moth, and as a booth that the keeper maketh.
lineList.cn: 他建造房屋如虫做窝，又如守望者所搭的棚。

lineList.en: The rich man shall lie down, but he shall not be gathered: he openeth his eyes, and he is not.
lineList.cn: 他虽富足躺卧，却不得收殓，转眼之间就不在了。

lineList.en: Terrors take hold on him as waters, a tempest stealeth him away in the night.
lineList.cn: 惊恐如波涛将他追上。暴风在夜间将他刮去。

lineList.en: The east wind carrieth him away, and he departeth: and as a storm hurleth him out of his place.
lineList.cn: 东风把他飘去，又刮他离开本处。

lineList.en: For God shall cast upon him, and not spare: he would fain flee out of his hand.
lineList.cn: 神要向他射箭，并不留情。他恨不得逃脱神的手。

lineList.en: Men shall clap their hands at him, and shall hiss him out of his place.
lineList.cn: 人要向他拍掌，并要发叱声，使他离开本处。
